main_features.description: Scrapes convocatorias de la UE, validates URLs, extracts data and manages pagination.
Manages PostgreSQL database for storing call details and related data.
Provides RESTful API for accessing convocatoria data through JWT authentication.
Monitors system status, displays statistics, shows results with pagination, and includes features like notifications.

corrective_actions.solution: Ensure that the import statement for declarative_base from SQLAlchemy is included at the top of the app/crud.py file.
